traits.name: Doomvault Devotion
entries: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
